pages.title: Using geofences for location-based notifications and events
pages.description: Create isochrones with the Mapbox Isochrone and Mapbox Tiling Service, and perform geofencing with the Mapbox Tilequery API.

pages.title: Get started using Mapbox Tiling Service and the Tilesets CLI
pages.description: Learn how to use the Tilesets CLI, a tool for accessing Mapbox Tiling Service (MTS), to create new Mapbox tilesets.

pages.title: Manage your tileset processing and tileset hosting costs
pages.description: Follow these practices to optimize your tileset processing and tileset hosting costs when you tile data using Mapbox Tiling Service or the Mapbox Uploads API.

pages.title: Adjust the zoom extent of your tileset
pages.description: Learn how to manually adjust the zoom extent of your tilesets.

pages.title: Upload data to Mapbox
pages.description: Learn how to prepare data for upload, interpret error messages, and troubleshoot failed uploads.
